summary: Provides a high‑level, one‑dimensional string array abstraction whose data resides on the Arkouda server, exposing Pythonic sequence semantics and a rich set of remote string manipulation operations such as searching, regex matching, case conversion, splitting, and concatenation.
business_intent: Enable scalable, server‑side processing of large text datasets for data‑analytics and scientific workloads, allowing users to perform complex string analytics without moving data to the client.
